content: I just pushed a minor change to the build and the log is over 500MB. Can the debug flag be turned off so it's possible to find out what failed?
Do you mean the publish command for the core spec, or an IG build? The core spec is failing due to some terminology issues.
core dumps a huge amount of debugging.. so core.
The terminology issues are fine, I just wanted to see if my change caused a problem but it was impossible to tell
